name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed commands through a compromised host to gain unauthorized access to sensitive files and to escalate privileges.

action--4ab1f507-1f58-43f2-a586-48c96f06.name: Kill malicious process
action--4ab1f507-1f58-43f2-a586-48c96f06.description: Terminate any malicious processes running on the compromised host.

action--d7e74a57-5f6b-49b5-a222-b510f19a.name: Run full system scan
action--d7e74a57-5f6b-49b5-a222-b510f19a.description: Perform a full system scan to detect and remove malware.

while-condition--af0e4e8e-0e8b-4187-a55a.name: Monitor network traffic for anomalies
while-condition--af0e4e8e-0e8b-4187-a55a.description: Loop to monitor network traffic until no anomalies are detected.

action--457c76d4-963e-4f76-a6b1-d6dd6c58.name: Monitor network traffic
action--457c76d4-963e-4f76-a6b1-d6dd6c58.description: Capture network traffic to identify suspicious patterns.

commands.command: tcpdump -i eth0 'tcp port 80 or tcp port 443'

parallel--734f0e16-a2b3-41f8-aa24-7b367d.name: Execute Mitigations in Parallel
parallel--734f0e16-a2b3-41f8-aa24-7b367d.description: Run the full system scan and monitor network traffic simultaneously.
